description: This file defines WebSocket configuration for the intelligent chat bot service, registering a WebSocket handler at the endpoint /ws/chat.

classes.name: WebSocketConfig
classes.description: Java class configuring WebSocket support, registering a handler at /ws/chat.

methods.name: WebSocketConfig
methods.description: Constructor that injects the chat WebSocket handler.

methods.name: registerWebSocketHandlers
methods.description: Method configuring WebSocket handler routes, allowing all origins temporarily.
